channel.description: Recent content in Case Study on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Is there a more economical and efficient alternative to Salesforce?
item.description: Choosing a direction when redefining your organization’s technical backbone is never easy. In this case study, we had the unique opportunity to observe the implementation of both - a Low-code/no-code CRM and tailored software solutions over two years.

item.title: A Centralized System for a Leading Consumer Lending Bank
item.description: Making Loan Processing Efficient by Transforming Manual Processes into a Centralized Automated System for a Consumer Lending Bank

item.title: Modernization: A Case Study
item.description: Case Study of our engagement with an industry leader in centralized expense management for telecom.

item.title: Taking a Mental Healthcare Solution Global
item.description: Making Mental Healthcare Accessible by Expanding the Solution Globally and Providing a Personalized Customer Experience

item.title: Monnai: A Product Launch Journey
item.description: Reinventing global consumer insights for fintech. The fintech market size stood at USD 112.5 billion in the year 2021.
